formattedAddress: 25 Waterside Plaza, New York, NY 10010, USA
adrFormatAddress: 25 Waterside Plaza, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text:
I worked with Sejal for a lower back injury over a few weeks, and it's been completely healed! The process was made approachable with incremental increase in exercise load. There were plenty of at-home exercises provided via an easy-to-use app. Sejal also took the time to explain her working theories of what might be causing the pain.

Besides the therapy process, both Sejal and Darren are very friendly, always in a positive mood and enjoy getting to know their patients well. It really felt like hanging out with friends!

originalText.text: What a great team this is! Caring and professional. I’ve had three sports related injuries over the last five years and I keep coming back to them.  They’re care is top notch.

text.text: What a great team this is! Caring and professional. I’ve had three sports related injuries over the last five years and I keep coming back to them.  They’re care is top notch.

originalText.text: I came in with very bad shoulder pain and uncomfortable tingling on my arm. Just a few weeks of sessions with Sejal and all the pain is gone! Others told me it could take months! Sejal was very thorough in trying to find the root cause and meticulously responsive in adjusting exercises as needed. Miracle worker!  Big plus that she’s a wonderful person, so the sessions are fun, too!

text.text: I came in with very bad shoulder pain and uncomfortable tingling on my arm. Just a few weeks of sessions with Sejal and all the pain is gone! Others told me it could take months! Sejal was very thorough in trying to find the root cause and meticulously responsive in adjusting exercises as needed. Miracle worker!  Big plus that she’s a wonderful person, so the sessions are fun, too!

originalText.text: I go to the Metro Sports at Waterside and Sejal and Darren are my therapists. They are absolutely wonderful. I fell and broke my tibea on my left foot and had 2 operations. I also have pain in my back and use a wheelchair which I want to get rid of. Sejal and Darren give me lower body exercises, both sitting and standing  and upper body exercises. I just started walking using the wheelchair and I feel wonderful. I can’t wait to get here and I hate leaving. I recommend them highly.

originalText.text:
Metro Sports is an exceptional physical therapy space.
It is located in Waterside Housing which is super convenient for tenants of Stuyvesant Town and Peter Cooper and of course Waterside.
Seyjal and Darren are a perfect team.
They created a program geared to my particular issues which helped tremendously and. which I'll use on my own.
I received 1 hour of their attentiom at my sessions.
I strongly recommend Metro P.T
